mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userAsset (userID, cash, stock, property, deposit, consume, loanAmount, loanPurpose, period, createDate, updateDate) VALUES (#{userID}, #{cash}, #{stock}, #{property}, #{deposit}, #{consume}, #{loanAmount}, #{loanPurpose}, #{period}, NOW(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE userAsset SET consume = #{consume}, cash = #{cash}, stock = #{stock}, property = #{property}, deposit = #{deposit}, updateDate = NOW() WHERE userID = #{userID}
